body:
PUNISHMENTS
If an account is caught participating in MMR boosting it faces the following punishment:

1.A two-week account suspension on League of Legends
2.Removal of any prior season’s ranked rewards (i.e. skins, icons, badges, etc)
3.Disqualification from receiving the current season’s ranked rewards (i.e. skins, icons, badges, etc)
4.Second time offenders’ accounts will be permanently banned from League of Legends


Does this rules still apply in this season and what does it mean by "ranked rewards" ik that all of it happens all at once ( besides the 4th one ) just curious

replies.body:
It applies, and it's simple if you get boosted you will get banned.

Ranked Rewards are the skin/border you get at the end of the season.
